data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

The starting point must be facing backward. If we look forward while taking 7 steps on the right side, we will reach the starting point. If we look left while taking 10 steps on the left side, we will arrive at the starting point after taking 10 steps on the right side. So, the answer is no.

This is a simple sequence that moves all about 3 in one direction. If you take one step and take 7 steps, you take 1 step, take 7 steps, and then take 7 steps until you are to the starting point. This is a very simple sequence that moves all around 3 in one direction. So, the answer is No.
